org.letras.psi.semantic
Interface IHandwritingRecognitionService

public interface IHandwritingRecognitionService

This interface declares the methods provided by a HandwritingRecognition-Services It abstracts from the concrete underlying Recognition Engine.

Author:
niklas

Field Summary
static int LANGUAGE_ENGLISH
           
static int LANGUAGE_GERMAN
           
 
Method Summary
 void startRecognitionFor(java.lang.String channel)
          Add the channel to the set of region-channels on which ink will be recognized and converted into HandwritingRecognitionResults The results will then be send back over the same channel.
 boolean startRecognitionFor(java.lang.String channel, int languageId)
          Same as startRecognitionFor(String) but adding a hint to use a specific language when recognizing the string
 void stopRecognitionFor(java.lang.String channel)
          Stop recognition on the specified region-channel

Constant Field Values
Method Detail

startRecognitionFor

void startRecognitionFor(java.lang.String channel)
Add the channel to the set of region-channels on which ink will be recognized and converted into HandwritingRecognitionResults The results will then be send back over the same channel.

Parameters:
channel - the region-channel on which to recognize the ink

startRecognitionFor

boolean startRecognitionFor(java.lang.String channel,
                            int languageId)
Same as startRecognitionFor(String) but adding a hint to use a specific language when recognizing the string

Parameters:
channel - the region-channel on which to recognize the ink
languageId - the languageId (e.g. LANGUAGE_ENGLISH,...)
Returns:
true if the language is available, false otherwise

stopRecognitionFor

void stopRecognitionFor(java.lang.String channel)
Stop recognition on the specified region-channel

Parameters:
channel - stop listening on this region-channel
